document.full_text: security forces attacked peaceful protesters in more than 20 villages with rubber bullets, stun grenades, shotguns and tear gas, according to human rights observers in bahrain.
document.title: bahrain ends martial law but renews crackdown on protests
lines_and_colors: security forces attacked peaceful protesters in more than 20 villages with rubber bullets, stun grenades, shotguns and tear gas, according to human rights observers in bahrain.
